precondition: The cursor is visible on the desktop wallpaper.
expected_results: A context menu labeled 'Arrange Icons By ▸' will appear, containing options such as 'Refresh', 'Paste', and 'Properties'. The cursor will change to a pointer hand shape.

precondition: The context menu on the desktop is open.
expected_results: The context menu will close, and the 'Display Properties' window will open.

precondition: The 'Appearance' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Click the 'Windows XP' option in the 'Theme' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The 'Active Window' preview will update to the 'Windows XP' theme. The 'Save As...' button will disappear, and a Recycle Bin icon will appear in the 'Active Window' preview.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open with the 'Themes' tab active.
expected_results: The 'Appearance' tab will become active, displaying options related to screen savers.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is active. The 'Settings' button is active.
expected_results: A list of screensaver options will appear. The 'Settings' button will become inactive.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Click the 'Screen saver' dropdown menu and select '3D FlowerBox'.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: A list of available screen savers will appear.

precondition: The 'Screen Saver' tab in the 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: A dialog box related to monitor power settings will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' window is open and the 'Home/Office Desk' power scheme is selected.
action: Click the 'Turn off monitor' dropdown menu and select 'After 5 hours'.
expected_results: The monitor idle time before power off will be set to 5 hours.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Display Properties' is partially visible in the background.
action: Click on the title bar of the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will become the active window and will be fully visible. The 'Windows Power Options Properties' dialog box will no longer be visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will close.
